title: Basic
description: This schema defines basic types that are used by other Kpi Definitions

kpiTargetType.description: This enum defines the type of key Result

kpiTarget.description: This schema defines the parameter values that can be passed for a Kpi Parameter.

name.description: name of the parameter. Must match the parameter names in metrics of the chart this objective refers

value.description: value to be passed for the Parameters. These are input from Users. We capture this in in string and convert during the runtime.

targetMet.description: whether the target value was met or not.

timestamp.description: Data one which result is updated

targetResult.description: Metric and their corresponding current results
